trends: There has been one other sighting in Sabattus
There were no other sightings in Sabattus on or around September 23rd 2012
Summary: Silent, straight line flight of greyish/silvery circular object. No idea how high.
divs: sighting detailsi looked up and saw a grey\silvery circular object. it was nw to se, no sound but seemed high up and moved faster than the normal planes passing by. i watched it fly over and go away in less than a minute. it was very cool to see, seemd like it was big but it was hard to figure size. i lost sight when it flew behind trees in back yard.
